about_the_game:
Fortune Guy is a multiplayer casual strategy game inspired by traditional Monopoly-style gameplay, but with more strategic elements. You’ll need a bit of luck, but also clever strategies to accumulate wealth and ultimately claim victory.

In the game, every decision matters. You’ll not only need to build structures to boost your economy but also cleverly use the tech system to gain powerful advantages. Each player can choose their own development path based on strategy or disrupt their opponents’ plans through random events, gradually expanding their lead.

Game Features:

  • Multiple Maps: Several maps with different styles and layouts.

  • Various Buildings: All spaces are empty, allowing you to build different types of buildings with various functions.

  • Random Events: Over dozens of random events that can provide rewards or cause trouble for your opponents.

  • Technology System: Multiple levels of technology, with dozens of upgrades that provide permanent buffs and unlock special abilities.

  • Customization System: Players can personalize their appearance with various outfits and skins to become a unique Fortune Guy.

Game Modes:

  • Random Matchmaking

  • Steam Friends Rooms

  • Single-Player Mode

  • Local Multiplayer

About Us:

This game is my first solo project, and I handled all aspects of it — planning, programming, and art. While there were many challenges during development, every step was enjoyable. I hope this game brings joy to everyone, and I truly appreciate your attention and support! If you enjoy games like Monopoly, Fortune Street, or other family-friendly dice games, Fortune Guy might be the game for you.
